div.div: Western New England vs. Westfield State

tr.td: Westfield wins toss, defers. WNE to recieve and defend north end zone
MichaelOrellana kickoff 60 yards to the WNE5, Dante Aiken return 15 yards to the WNE20 (John Ollari).
Kevin Peabody rush for 6 yards to the WNE26 (Joey Mespelli).
Mohamed Camara rush for 9 yards to the WNE35, 1ST DOWN WNE (Drew Brigner).
